title: Standing Vase
description: Standing Vase; Mounts attributed to Pierre-Philippe Thomire (French, 1751 - 1843, master 1772); Paris, France; porcelain mid-1700s; mount about 1785; Hard-paste porcelain, blue ground color; gilt bronze mounts; rouge griotte marble; 81 × 56.5 cm (31 7/8 × 22 1/4 in.); 70.DI.115; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
